task.title: Enable or Disable Scheduling Notifications
task.shortdesc: Employee notification preferences can be enabled or disabled for the Scheduling feature. These notifications include schedule published, schedule reminders, and change request approved or rejected.

step.cmd: Select the Preferences tab, and then select Edit.
Select the delivery type for each notification.
If you are configuring the Schedule Reminder notification, select how many days in advance the notification should be sent to the employee's dashboard.
Ensure the job is ready to be run (Job Scheduler > Edit Job).
